LegalNotice.title: Legal Notice & Terms of Service
LegalNotice.termsIntro: By using this website, you accept these terms of service.
LegalNotice.serviceDescriptionText: Tell Me a Sheep is a personalized children's story generation service using artificial intelligence. The service offers a limited free version and a premium version by subscription.
LegalNotice.freePlanText: 1 story every 5 days, AI-generated, with audio narration.
LegalNotice.premiumPlanText: Unlimited stories, priority access, early access to new features. Monthly subscription (€2.99/month) or annual (€29.90/year).
LegalNotice.paymentText: Payments are secured by Stripe. Subscriptions are automatically renewed. You can cancel anytime from your account.
LegalNotice.refundText: No refunds after premium subscription activation. You can cancel anytime to avoid renewal.
LegalNotice.intellectualPropertyText: Generated stories belong to you for personal use. The website and its design are protected by copyright. Commercial use of stories requires authorization.
LegalNotice.userResponsibilityText: You agree to use the service appropriately. AI-generated content should be supervised by an adult before reading to children.
LegalNotice.limitationText: The service is provided as is. We do not guarantee the accuracy or relevance of AI-generated content. Parental supervision recommended.
LegalNotice.terminationText: You can delete your account at any time. We reserve the right to suspend access in case of violation of the Terms of Service.
LegalNotice.dataText: We collect: email, name (optional), story preferences. This data is stored securely (Neon PostgreSQL). You can request deletion of your data at any time via designmoiunmouton@gmail.com.
LegalNotice.dataUsageText: Your data is used only for the operation of the service. We do not sell or share your data with third parties, except payment processors (Stripe).
LegalNotice.dataRightsText: Right to access, rectification, deletion, portability. Contact designmoiunmouton@gmail.com to exercise your rights.
LegalNotice.cookiesText: This site uses essential technical cookies (authentication, preferences). No advertising or tracking cookies.
LegalNotice.aiText: Stories are generated by Google Gemini AI. Voice synthesis uses Google Text-to-Speech. Content is created automatically and requires parental supervision.
LegalNotice.updatesText: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service. Changes take effect immediately after publication on the site.
